verbs.description: funeralize (third-person singular simple present funeralizes, present participle funeralizing, simple past and past participle funeralized)

entries.meaning: To officiate at a funeral service for, to hold a funeral service for.
examples: Pardon me, for yielding to a temporary impulse of this character, at the hazard of seeming to funeralize, rather than compliment my congregation.
